label: Content Builder
note: Use the standard Content Builder blocks to create a reusable fragment.

label: Search Form
note: A standard search form. Redirects to the search results page when submitted.

label: Newsletter Signup
note: Embeds the 'Newsletter Subscription' form, editable via 'Formie'.

label: Content Chunk
note: Default formatting for individual content chunks.

label: Custom HTML
note: Please use with caution. You can break things by using this.
